formatted_address: Lot G-02, 6, Pusat Komersial Sunway Marketplace, Persiaran Medini, Bandar Medini Iskandar, 79250 Iskandar Puteri, Johor, Malaysia
name: Ace Hardware @ Sunway Big Box Retail Park

reviews.text: This store has a lot of US hardware and household products that are rarely found in local shops. Prices can be a bit high, but the sales are worth checking out! I scored a great deal today—mason jars that cost RM18.80 each on S****e were only RM44.97 for 12 after a 70% discount. So happy with this find! Definitely coming back to hunt for more rare and imported items.

Come and support. Lots of home stuff and hardware. Price, i think, is reasonable. One stop solution for your home needs.

Great place for DIY shopping. Many available items ready. Wide variety of products.
Located near parking. Quick walk, hassle free. Everything you want under 1 roof. Variety choice

Lots of stock is only displayed in American sizes. No indication about metric sizes and when I asked the staff was told to use my phone.
Also, still no Bells of Uranus after asking for the last 2 years.

vicinity: 6, Pusat Komersial Sunway Marketplace, Lot G-02, Persiaran Medini, Bandar Medini Iskandar, Iskandar Puteri
